actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Winston Churchill Memorial and Library in the United States for the construction of educational facilities at such memorial and library, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to make grants in the amount of $500,000 for fiscal year 1974, and $500,000 for each of the four succeeding fiscal years, to the Winston Churchill Memorial and Library in the United States, located at Westminster College, Fulton Missouri, for the construction of educational facilities at such memorial and library to honor Sir Winston Churchill.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Winston Churchill Memorial and Library in the United States for the construction of educational facilities at such memorial and library, and for other purposes.
